Terminion stopped and the other 4 start pushing him forward.

Terminion: Ho=
ld the internet connection, here, what's this about eating people? It sound=
s kind of like you're crazy.

Junk Man: There is nothing wrong with being c=
razy! Don't listen to him, he's so rude.

Terminion: I'M rude? You wrecked =
my ship!

Junk Man: Shut up...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Lur=
kerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:4=
5 AM
  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


        Skulletron:  Shut u=
p.  Or else I'll eat you first!

        Skulletron sneared and kept on wal=
king...

        -------Original Message-------

        From: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com
        Date: August 04, 2002 02:57:02 AM
        To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com
        Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

        Mincer=
: Will this lead us out of the desert?...

          ----- Original Message=
 -----
          From: LurkerAbyss
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
   =
       Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 1:59 AM
          Subject: Re: Charact=
er Debut/Return...


                Skulletron glared at Terminion siniste=
rly, and  then looked forward and continued walking...

                ---=
----Original Message-------

                From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
 =
               Date: August 04, 2002 02:17:30 AM
                To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com
                Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

  =
              Terminion stares.

                Terminion: We're supposed =
to trust you?

                He looked at the other 4.

                M=
onster: Grr.

                Terminion: Okay. Let's go.

                T=
hey follow Skulletron. Who knows why? They just do...

                  --=
--- Original Message -----
                  From: LurkerAbyss
            =
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                  Sent: Sunday, August 04,=
 2002 1:32 AM
                  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


  =
                      Skulletron looked at the Five Felons, observed them c=
arefully.  He spit at their feet.

                        Skulletron:  I'v=
e seen too much.  You follow me.  Or else, I will devour you.  And I'm not =
kidding.  Don't speak until spoken to.  Don't try anything funny, unless yo=
u feel like dieing.

                        The Slaughter(organic) half of=
 him hissed, as slime dripped from his mouth  and body.  Skulletron then be=
gan walking forward.  He slipped a gun out from a special compartment, and =
aimed it at Terminion's head, and then dropped his arm and gun back down to=
 his side, and continued walking...

                        -------Origina=
l Message-------

                        From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
    =
                    Date: August 04, 2002 01:28:04 AM
                     =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                        Subject: Re: Characte=
r Debut/Return...

                        The Five Felons were just stroll=
ing up when this incredible act happened!

                        Terminio=
n: Hello.

                        He got ready to draw one of his weapons =
should he need to.

                        Terminion: Hello friend.

     =
                   Junk Man wasn't used to being serious. Since the 5 chara=
cter limit started, it was tough to survive as a serious character, you jus=
t got ignored.

                        Junk Man: Ask him what side he's on=
.

                        Danny: No, stupid, what side are WE on?

       =
                 Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of Cardhead getting decap=
itated and disemboweled...

                          ----- Original Messag=
e -----
                          From: LurkerAbyss
                       =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                          Sent: Saturday, Aug=
ust 03, 2002 1:07 PM
                          Subject: Character Debut/Ret=
urn...


                                OOC:  Yesss, it's here, my first c=
haracter in this "restart".  God, I hate this damn restart.  NBWRPG used to=
 be so perfect...

                                BIC: 

                 =
               A deserted stretch of land.  A sky, once a bright shade of b=
lue, was now being replaced by a quick moving area of darkness.  Soon, rain=
 started to fall and showered the ground.  Thunder boomed as lightning pier=
ced the sky.  As time flew by, the storm raged on, getting more violent eac=
h minute.  The sky suddenly bloomed a dark purple.  A monsterous bolt of li=
ghtning struck the earth below.  The wet mud that was once dirt spewed thro=
ugh the air, as a fist plunged up from the ground!  Another streak of light=
ning met with the fist.  There was an explosion of sparks, and then the gro=
und started to shake vigorously.  The fist started rising out of the ground=
, and revealed an arm.  The arm kept rising, and then another fist and arm =
popped out of the ground.  Soon, a head was revealed.  The figure started f=
orcing its way out of the ground.  The storm had reached its peak of brutal=
ity, destroying ground and raging on madly.  Within a matter of long, never=
-ending minutes, the figure stood on two legs now.  The storm stopped just =
then, so suddenly.  Everything seemed to stop at that moment.  The rain, ev=
erything, just disappeared.  The sky was blue, the sun was beaming, not a s=
ingle cloud up there.  Calm as a sleeping baby.  The figure that stood on t=
he land was hideous.  It was almost two things merged into one.  One half w=
as metallic, almost robotic.  The other half, was slimy, and organic, with =
a pincir for a hand.......

                                ENTER SKULLETRO=
N/SLAUGHTER...

          on the land was hideous.  It was almost two 
               =
                 things merged into one.  One half was 
              =
                  metallic, almost robotic.  The 
                    =
            other half, was slimy, and organic, with a 
              =
                  pincir for a hand.......</DIV>
                          =
      <DIV> </DIV>
